languages.text: Словно муравьи облепили воины Омниссии остов нечестивой машины, и почтенный Магос Доминус привел в действие священный атомный заряд, закрепленный на его теле. Взрыв был столь силен, что оторвал и изуродовал клешню древнего механизма ереси, и Крик скверны с позором бежал. Таков был подвиг Оптикона-22.

traits.locale_text: Словно муравьи облепили воины Омниссии остов нечестивой машины, и почтенный Магос Доминус привел в действие священный ядерный заряд, закрепленный на его теле. Взрыв был столь силен, что оторвал и изуродовал клешню древнего механизма ереси, и Крик скверны с позором бежал. Таков был подвиг Оптикона-22.

languages.text: The Omnissiah's warriors clung to Doomscream's abominable frame like ants. When the hour was right, the venerable Magos Dominus activated the sacred atomic charge that was affixed to his body. The force of the explosion tore off and mangled one of Doomscream's pincers, and the ancient heretical machine fled in shame. That was Opticon-22's feat.
languages.original_text: Словно муравьи облепили воины Омниссии остов нечестивой машины, и почтенный Магос Доминус привел в действие священный атомный заряд, закрепленный на его теле. Взрыв был столь силен, что оторвал и изуродовал клешню древнего механизма ереси, и Крик скверны с позором бежал. Таков был подвиг Оптикона-22.

traits.locale_text: The Omnissiah's warriors clung to Balescream's abominable frame like ants. When the hour was right, the venerable Magos Dominus activated the sacred atomic charge that was affixed to his body. The force of the explosion tore off and mangled one of Balescream's pincers, and the ancient heretical machine fled in shame. That was the feat of Opticon-22.

The force of the explosion tore off and mangled one of Balescream's pincers, and the ancient heretical machine fled in shame. That was the feat of Opticon-22.

The force of the explosion tore off and mangled one of Balescream's pincers, and the ancient heretical machine fled in shame. That was Opticon-22's feat.

The Omnissiah's warriors clung to Doomscream's abominable frame like ants. When the hour was right, the venerable Magos Dominus activated the sacred atomic charge that was affixed to his body. The force of the explosion tore off and mangled one of Doomscream's pincers, and the ancient heretical machine fled in shame. That was Opticon-22's feat.

The Omnissiah's warriors clung to Doomscream's abominable frame like ants. When the hour was right, the venerable Magos Dominus activated the sacred atomic charge that was affixed to his body. The force of the explosion tore off and mangled one of Doomscream's pincers, and the ancient heretical machine fled in shame. That was Opticon-22's feat.

languages.text: 欧姆尼塞亚的战士们像蚂蚁一样，紧紧地攀附在灾啸邪恶的身躯上。时机到来时，那位尊贵的统御贤者启动了随身携带的神圣原子弹。可怕的爆炸将灾啸的其中一只利爪生生炸断，而那头古老的怪物羞愧难当地逃走了。这便是奥普蒂孔22号的英勇壮举。
languages.original_text: The Omnissiah's warriors clung to Doomscream's abominable frame like ants. When the hour was right, the venerable Magos Dominus activated the sacred atomic charge that was affixed to his body. The force of the explosion tore off and mangled one of Doomscream's pincers, and the ancient heretical machine fled in shame. That was Opticon-22's feat.

traits.locale_text: 欧姆尼塞亚的战士们像蚂蚁一样，紧紧地攀附在灾啸邪恶的身躯上。时机到来时，那位尊贵的统御贤者启动了随身携带的神圣原子弹。可怕的爆炸将灾啸的其中一只利爪生生炸断，而那头古老的怪物羞愧难当地逃走了。这便是奥普蒂孔22号的英勇壮举。

languages.text: Les guerriers de l'Omnimessie se sont accrochés à l'abominable châssis du Fléau Hurlant comme autant de minuscules fourmis. Au moment propice, le vénérable magos dominus a activé la charge atomique sacrée qui était fixée à son corps. L'explosion a arraché l'une des pinces du Fléau Hurlant, forçant la machine hérétique à fuir dans la honte. Et cet exploit, c'est à Opticon-22 que nous le devons.
languages.original_text: The Omnissiah's warriors clung to Doomscream's abominable frame like ants. When the hour was right, the venerable Magos Dominus activated the sacred atomic charge that was affixed to his body. The force of the explosion tore off and mangled one of Doomscream's pincers, and the ancient heretical machine fled in shame. That was Opticon-22's feat.

traits.locale_text: Les guerriers de l'Omnimessie se sont accrochés à l'abominable châssis du Fléau Hurlant comme autant de minuscules fourmis. Au moment propice, le vénérable magos dominus a activé la charge atomique sacrée qui était fixée à son corps. L'explosion a arraché l'une des pinces du Fléau Hurlant, forçant la machine hérétique à fuir dans la honte. Et cet exploit, c'est à Opticon-22 que nous le devons.

languages.text: 万機神の戦士たちは蟻のようにドゥームスクリームの忌まわしい体躯にまとわりついた。頃合いを見計らって、由緒正しきマゴス・ドミヌスは体に貼り付けた聖なる原子爆弾を起動させた。爆発の威力はドゥームスクリームの鋏の一本を引きちぎって破壊し、古代の異端機械は恥を抱えて逃げ出した。それがオプティコン-22の偉業だった。
languages.original_text: The Omnissiah's warriors clung to Doomscream's abominable frame like ants. When the hour was right, the venerable Magos Dominus activated the sacred atomic charge that was affixed to his body. The force of the explosion tore off and mangled one of Doomscream's pincers, and the ancient heretical machine fled in shame. That was Opticon-22's feat.

traits.locale_text: 万機神の戦士たちは蟻のようにドゥームスクリームの忌まわしい体躯にまとわりついた。頃合いを見計らって、由緒正しきマゴス・ドミヌスは体に貼り付けた聖なる原子爆弾を起動させた。爆発の威力はドゥームスクリームの鋏の一本を引きちぎって破壊し、古代の異端機械は恥を抱えて逃げ出した。それがオプティコン-22の偉業だった。

languages.text: Los guerreros del Omnissiah se aferraron al execrable chasis de Doomscream como si fueran hormigas. Cuando llegó el momento, el venerable Magos Dominus activó la sagrada carga atómica que tenía implantada en el cuerpo. La fuerza de la explosión arrancó una de las tenazas de Doomscream, deformándola, y la antigua máquina hereje se vio obligada a huir avergonzada. Tal fue la gesta de Opticon-22.
languages.original_text: The Omnissiah's warriors clung to Doomscream's abominable frame like ants. When the hour was right, the venerable Magos Dominus activated the sacred atomic charge that was affixed to his body. The force of the explosion tore off and mangled one of Doomscream's pincers, and the ancient heretical machine fled in shame. That was Opticon-22's feat.

traits.locale_text: Los guerreros del Omnissiah se aferraron al execrable chasis de Balescream como si fueran hormigas. Cuando llegó el momento, el venerable Magos Dominus activó la sagrada carga atómica que tenía implantada en el cuerpo. La fuerza de la explosión arrancó una de las tenazas de Balescream, deformándola, y la antigua máquina hereje se vio obligada a huir avergonzada. Tal fue la gesta de Opticon-22.

languages.text: Die Krieger des Omnissiah klammerten sich an Unheilsschreis widerwärtigen Körper wie Ameisen. Als die richtige Stunde gekommen war, aktivierte der ehrenwerte Magos Dominus den heiligen nuklearen Sprengsatz, der an seinem Körper befestigt war. Die Gewalt der Explosion riss eine von Unheilsschreis Scheren ab und verstümmelte sie, und die uralte Ketzermaschine floh beschämt. Das war die Heldentat von Opticon-22.
languages.original_text: The Omnissiah's warriors clung to Doomscream's abominable frame like ants. When the hour was right, the venerable Magos Dominus activated the sacred atomic charge that was affixed to his body. The force of the explosion tore off and mangled one of Doomscream's pincers, and the ancient heretical machine fled in shame. That was Opticon-22's feat.

traits.locale_text: Die Krieger des Omnissiah klammerten sich an Unheilsschreis widerwärtigen Körper wie Ameisen. Als die richtige Stunde gekommen war, aktivierte der ehrenwerte Magos Dominus den heiligen nuklearen Sprengsatz, der an seinem Körper befestigt war. Die Gewalt der Explosion riss eine von Unheilsschreis Scheren ab und verstümmelte sie, und die uralte Ketzermaschine floh beschämt. Das war die Heldentat von Opticon-22.

languages.text: Hermesih'in savaşçıları, Belanarası'nın menfur silüetine karıncalar misali üşüştü. Doğru anı kollayan muhterem Magos Dominus, bedeni bünyesindeki kutsal atom bombasını patlattı. Patlamanın kudreti, Belanarası'nın kıskaçlarından birini koparıp garabete ağır hasar verdi. Bunun üzerine kadim kâfir makine, utanç içerisinde kaçtı. Opticon-22, onu korkutup kaçırmayı başarmıştı.
languages.original_text: The Omnissiah's warriors clung to Doomscream's abominable frame like ants. When the hour was right, the venerable Magos Dominus activated the sacred atomic charge that was affixed to his body. The force of the explosion tore off and mangled one of Doomscream's pincers, and the ancient heretical machine fled in shame. That was Opticon-22's feat.
